title: ISic020013. ISic020013
body:
Facsimile Images

((cross_uninterpreted)) +

Apparatus criticus

Text after Agostiniani 1977 (IAS I)

English translation

Italian translation

commentary

Cross-shaped sign recurrent as a mark throughout the ancient world. Cf. Agostiniani 1977, p.11, which reports some parallels with Attic ceramic: Graef, Langlotz 1933, p.128, no.1523, N 456; Milne 1936, fig. 34, no.14; F.Xanthos IV, p.174, nos. 400-401.

    Metzger 1972 p.174, nos. 400-401 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001748 Milne 1936 fig. 34, no.14 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002564 Graef, Langlotz 1933 p.128, no.1523, N 456 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002563
